description: Describes a product or a service offered to the end consumer by the provider. In the mobility sector, it can represent a fare product like one way journey. In the logistics sector, it can represent the delivery service offering. In the retail domain it can represent a product like a grocery item.

category_ids.description: Categories this item can be listed under

fulfillment_ids.description: Modes through which this item can be fulfilled

location_ids.description: Provider Locations this item is available in

matched.description: Whether this item is an exact match of the request

parent_item_quantity.description: The number of units of the parent item this item is a multiple of

payment_ids.description: Payment modalities through which this item can be ordered

price.description: The price of this item, if it has intrinsic value

quantity.description: The selling quantity of the item

rateable.description: Whether this item can be rated

recommended.description: Whether this item is a recommended item to a response

related.description: Whether this item is a related item to the exactly matched item

replacement_terms.description: Terms that are applicable be met when this item is replaced

return_terms.description: Terms that are applicable when this item is returned

time.description: Temporal attributes of this item. This property is used when the item exists on the catalog only for a limited period of time.

ttl.description: Time to live in seconds for an instance of this schema

xinput.description: Additional input required from the customer to purchase / avail this item
